traits.name: Tactical Readiness
entries: Maggie and allies within 30 feet of her have advantage on initiative rolls, as long as Maggie isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Giant Maul
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, Maggie can force it to make a DC 14 Strength saving throw; on a failed save, the target is pushed 5 feet away from Maggie and knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Hammer Toss
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, Maggie can force it to make a DC 14 Strength saving throw; on a failed save, the target is pushed 5 feet away from Maggie and knocked {@condition prone}.
